string.value: Lana says she needs to pick out a song for Blake. Talk to #bLana#k for more details on what she needs.
Blake needs a song to perform. Find the CDs at the music shop on the 7th-8th floor and deliver them to #bLana#k.
Lana said the existing hits weren't good enough and asked you to get a new song from #bMaestro Rho#k.
It's time to pick out the music Blake is going to perform. First, we have to listen to a lot of popular hits. Could you bring me some CDs from Kerning Square?
The music shop is located on the 7th and 8th floors. Please bring me #b50 Latest Hits Compilation CDs and 50 Greatest Oldies CDs#k.
We can't have Blake perform without music. Obviously.
Did you bring the CDs? Hand them over. I have to listen to them.

Hm, the latest hits are all right...but we can't captivate an audience with them. We need a brand new song, composed just for Blake. Ah, Maestro Rho would be perfect. He's a little arrogant, but he's a genius at composing. With his music, Blake will become a star in no time. We need a song from #bMaestro Rho#k.
Please bring me #b50 Latest Hits Compilation CDs and 50 Greatest Oldies CDs#k from the 7th-8th floor of Kerning Square.
